snippet: State Farm said that its chief operating officer, Michael Tipsord, would become its next chief executive, succeeding Ed Rust Jr., who has led the private company since 1985.
abstract: State Farm announces chief operating officer Michael Tipsord will become next chief executive, succeeding Ed Rust Jr, who has led company since 1985.
lead_paragraph: State Farm said that its chief operating officer, Michael Tipsord, would become its next chief executive, succeeding Ed Rust Jr., who has led the private company since 1985.

headline.main: Chief of State Farm Is to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Chief of State Farm Is to Step Down
